channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2265] 7 Crimes That Will Get You a Smaller Fine than File-Sharing
item.description: In response to the recent sentences against illegal downloaders for millions of dollars, here are seven crimes that will cost you less than downloading songs off BitTorrent.

item.title: [+2223] From Universe to Multiverse. Are You Ready? [Video]
item.description: Michio Kaku speaks about multiverse and parallel universes.

item.title: [+2054] Where Does the Internet Come From? (PIC)
item.description: A look at how information moves now, and how it moved 100 years ago.

item.title: [+1741] 25 Great Pirate Bay Alternatives
item.description: The end of the Pirate Bay is nearing. Even if the deal with GGF doesn’t go through the current owners are likely to sell to one of the other interested parties. For many BitTorrent fans this means that they have to find an alternative. Luckily there are plenty of good ones out there.

item.title: [+1722] McDonald's Has a Website for Black People
[+1608] 15 Yr Old Student Got $1500 Hush Money After Boning Teacher
item.description: A former Helper Junior High School teacher charged with having a sexual relationship with a 15-year-old male student paid her victim between $1,400 and $1,500 after the encounters, court documents allege.

item.title: [+1542] High-Speed Robot Hand
item.description: Alternate title: The robots are one step closer to fucking us all up.

item.title: [+1413] If you compare Obama to the Nazis, you need a history lesson
item.description: I hope this column makes you sick. Once upon a lifetime ago, 6 million people with DNA, names and faces just like you and I, were butchered with gleeful sadism and mechanistic dispatch. You and I may no longer respect one another, but is it asking too much that we still respect them?

item.title: [+1363] The (modern) American Beauty [Possibly NSFW]
[+1223] Ur doin it wrong... [PIC]
item.description: Who says cats and dogs can't get along?

item.title: [+1118] A Conversation With a Scientologist - 22/08/2009
item.description: This video was filmed on the 22nd of Aug 2009 in East Grinstead, United Kingdom.I asked a Church of Scientology Sea Org member if he knew that David Miscavige had been beating his staff and that Marty Rathbun and Mike Rinder had left the CoS and were speaking out. His response is shown here.

item.title: [+914] What Anime fanboys must look like to the Japanese (COMIC)
item.description: a view from the other perspective.

item.title: [+903] Getting Air (PIC)
item.description: Flickr member Sierraromeo [sarah-ji]'s terrific reminder of what it was like to be too short for the world around you, while just trying to stay cool.

item.title: [+867] Homeless Man Leaves Behind Surprise: $4 Million : NPR
item.description: Richard Leroy Walters, a homeless man who lived in Phoenix, died two years ago. What people didn't know was that he was a millionaire. In his will, he left money for nonprofits — including NPR — and a nurse who befriended him 13 years ago. Rita Belle talks about their unlikely friendship.

item.title: [+660] It's Time to End the War on Sharing
item.description: When record companies make a fuss about the danger of "piracy", they're not talking about violent attacks on shipping.

item.title: [+657] The day the Red Arrows were upstaged by Mother Nature
item.description: A rainbow cast itself across the coast of Fowey in Cornwall just as the RAF acrobatic team were about to perform its stunts.

item.title: [+629] It’s not just Facebook 4Chan Hacks Christians Social Network
item.description: The hackers have also sent a number of emails to friends and family pretending they have either converted religion, changed sexuality, are dying of AIDS or have been affected by some other unchristian like situation.

item.title: [+527] Get Back Here!
item.description: You fucked with the wrong chicken buster!

item.title: [+522] The Cost of Not Having a Public Option
item.description: The California Nurses Association just sent out a press release highlighting new report from the Commonwealth Fund that projects a 94% increase in health insurance premiums by 2020, if effective reforms aren't enacted.

item.title: [+516] Holy Crap! Missmatch of the century
item.description: The biggest man in Aussie Rules Football: Aaron Sandilands from The Fremantle Dockers stands 211cm and weighs 125kg. 6' 11" and 275 lb
